name: navNote for Business Professionals
headline: AI-Powered Task Management for Work-Life Balance
description: navNote helps busy professionals manage tight schedules, prioritize important tasks, optimize travel time, and balance work commitments with personal life.
keywords: business task management, professional scheduler, meeting organizer, work productivity app, executive time management

hasPart.name: Meeting Optimizer
hasPart.description: AI-powered meeting scheduling with travel time accounting and priority-based suggestions.

hasPart.name: Client Location Manager
hasPart.description: Location-aware reminders when near client offices for efficient meeting preparation.

hasPart.name: Work-Life Balancer
hasPart.description: Intelligent blocking of personal time and family commitments to prevent work overflow.

hasPart.name: Travel Time Optimizer
hasPart.description: Task suggestions that minimize travel between locations for maximum efficiency.

offers.name: Team Plan
offers.description: Per user for teams of 5+ members

offers.name: Enterprise Plan
offers.description: Custom pricing for large organizations with additional security features
